author: juarce_yac
content:
Hi. I'm trying to use ethereum package to test my network locally (I was using anvil previously, but now I need access to a consensus client). 
When I try to run ethereum-package with a list of preloaded_contracts, I get the following error:
```
Creating genesis
There was an error executing Starlark code
An error occurred executing instruction (number 20) at github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/src/prelaunch_data_generator/el_cl_genesis/el_cl_genesis_generator.star[64:26]:
  run_sh(name="run-generate-genesis", run="cp /opt/values.env /config/values.env && ./entrypoint.sh all && mkdir /network-configs && mv /data/metadata/* /network-configs/ && mv /data/parsed /network-configs/parsed", image="ethpandaops/ethereum-genesis-generator:4.1.0", files={"/opt": "genesis-el-cl-env-file"}, store=[StoreSpec(src="/network-configs/", name="el_cl_genesis_data"), StoreSpec(src="/network-configs/genesis_validators_root.txt", name="genesis_validators_root".... allocation for 0xafF0CA253b97e54440965855cec0A8a2E2399896\nAdding static premine wallets...\nAdditional contracts file: /opt/additional-contracts.json\nAdding additional contracts...\nApplying allocations to genesis files...\n/apps/el-gen/generate_genesis.sh: line 146: /usr/local/bin/jq: Argument list too long\n"

Error encountered running Starlark code.
```

It seems the list of preloaded contracts is too long.

My network params is available here (https://github.com/yetanotherco/aligned_layer/blob/1936-fixethereum_package-update-contracts-to-new-eigenlayer-version/network_params.yaml)

And you can run it using the following command:

```
kurtosis run --enclave aligned github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package --args-file network_params.yaml
```

Is there a way to fix this error?

author: barnabasbusa
content: Hi. I'm trying to use ethereum package
